name: Dolores L. ROSS, Appellant v. SOCIETY HILL TOWERS, Eastern Engineering & Elevator Company and Otis Elevator Company

judges: Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
parties: Dolores L. ROSS, Appellant v. SOCIETY HILL TOWERS, Eastern Engineering & Elevator Company and Otis Elevator Company.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
CAPPY and NIGRO, JJ., dissent.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Lawrence D. Finney, Philadelphia, for Dolores L. Ross.
Kean K. McDonald, Jeffrey D. Hutton, Philadelphia, for Society Hill Towers.
William V. Coleman, Thomas Finarelli, Philadelphia, for Otis Elevator.
Kevin J. Connors, Philadelphia, for Eastern Engineering Co.
casebody.head_matter:
684 A.2d 1067
Dolores L. ROSS, Appellant v. SOCIETY HILL TOWERS, Eastern Engineering & Elevator Company and Otis Elevator Company.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Oct. 15, 1996.
Decided Nov. 8, 1996.
Lawrence D. Finney, Philadelphia, for Dolores L. Ross.
Kean K. McDonald, Jeffrey D. Hutton, Philadelphia, for Society Hill Towers.
William V. Coleman, Thomas Finarelli, Philadelphia, for Otis Elevator.
Kevin J. Connors, Philadelphia, for Eastern Engineering Co.
Before FLAHERTY, C.J., and ZAPPALA, CAPPY, CASTILLE, NIGRO and NEWMAN, JJ.
